amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to deployment of new nuclear power plants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 875 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 214.

action.text: Amendment SA 875 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S7576-7590) To strike the provision relating to deployment of new nuclear power plants.
